items.title: Michael Saylor’s Strategy flirts again with the danger threshold at which his company is worth less than his Bitcoin
items.description: Why hold a stock that is worth less than the underlying asset it represents?

items.title: Tesla is officially smaller than China’s BYD in EV sales as it reports second-straight year of falling sales
items.description: Tesla stock is down over 6% over the last five days but the market seemed to be expecting Friday's news about EV deliveries.

items.title: Michigan college survey says ‘6-7’ is lowkey cooked, put in on the ‘Banished Words List’
items.description: The Lake Superior State University roundup of overused slang started in 1976 as a New Year’s Eve party idea.

items.title: Betty Boop and Blondie join Mickey Mouse and Winnie the Pooh in the public domain
items.description: “It’s a big year,” said Jennifer Jenkins of Duke’s Center for the Study of the Public Domain. “It's just the sheer familiarity of all this culture.”

items.title: Runaway boulder on Indiana Jones set rolls over Disney World worker
items.description: “We’re focused on supporting our cast member, who is recovering," Disney said in a statement.
